About

Me

Hey there!
I am Gabriel Le Breton, a developer who likes to play with cool things such as Python, Django, coffeescript and AngularJS. I like to work on open source projects, I organised some Lan Party and Game Jams. I also gave a few talks about programming, web crawling and funny tools.
